title: Tuberculin Skin Testing | University Health Services | UC College of Medicine
description: University Health Services at the University of Cincinnati is the comprehensive health care clinic for all students at the university. We have two campus heath clinics - one on the main university campus and another on the medical campus. Managed within the University of Cincinnati College of Medicine, all providers are clinical faculty and physicians with UC Health.
cleaned_text: travel vaccines, and TB screenings are available by appointment. Richard E. Lindner Center2751 O'Varsity Way, 3rd
